thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 5 of 699
thread.title: CHRISTINE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by CHRISTINE

author: CHRISTINE
title: CHRISTINE
text: We had the loveliest car to drive. Booked a small car and was upgraded to the Hyundai Sonata. What a marvellous car. No complaints, car was in excellent condition, no problems at all. Staff very helpful, friendly, professional. Have never used Redspot before but won't hesitate to use them again.
